body.name: Pink King Size Quilt Bedding Sets with Pillow Shams, Lightweight Soft Bedspread Coverlet, Quilted Blanket Thin Comforter Bed Cover, All Season Summer Spring, 3 Pieces, 104x90 inches
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: High material: 100% microfiber polyester, more durable, soft and cozy, skin friendly quilt sets, lightweight quilt king size bedspread coverlet set.
Package Includes: The quilt set includes 1 quilt king (104x90") and 2 pillow shams (20" x 36") which would fit king size bed.

Multiple Occasions: This quilt is suitable for all season, you could use as air conditioning quilt in summer. In winter, you could add a blanket or comforter underneath. Depending on the season, you can use it as a quilt, bedspread or coverlet.

Easy to care: Machine washable, machine wash in room temperature, sun dry or tumble dry. Do not bleach or iron. The bedding set gets softer with every wash and is pilling, shrinking and fading resistance.
If you have any question, please contact us by email or Q&A, we focus on the quality of products and care about your satisfaction.
body.description: WDCOZY Pink King Size Quilt Bedding Sets with Pillow Shams, Lightweight Soft Bedspread Coverlet, Quilted Blanket Thin Comforter Bed Cover, All Season Summer Spring, 3 Pieces, 104x90 inches

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and perfect
reviews.reviewText: This set is perfect! I was looking for a soft pink quilt set to put over our white duvet to give the bed a little color and to add that extra layer on cool nights. This set is so buttery soft and the perfect muted pink for an adult bedroom. (It doesn’t look like we put a child’s bedding set on our bed.) Perfect size for the queen bed, light as an additional layer on the bed, and very soft and pretty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bed cover
reviews.reviewText: The Green King Size Quilt Bedding Set exceeded my expectations in terms of both quality and style. The dark sage olive color is rich and sophisticated, adding a touch of elegance to my bedroom. The lightweight and soft bedspread provide just the right amount of warmth, making it perfect for all seasons, especially summer and spring. The quilted blanket is well-crafted, and the thin comforter design is both cozy and breathable. The set includes pillow shams that complement the overall aesthetic. With dimensions of 104x90 inches, it generously covers the bed. If you're looking for a high-quality, stylish, and versatile bedding set, this Green Quilt is an excellent choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We generally are fighting over blankets throughout the night, so wanted to find something wider and longer to eliminate the issue. This works like a charm; it's big enough that we both have ample to cover with and looks pretty on the bed!! It's light weight, but, that is perfect for us and still keeps up plenty warm on the cold WI nights

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bang for your buck
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a lightweight quilt comforter, and let me tell you, it has completely transformed my sleep experience. This heavenly creation deserves all the praise it can get, and I am more than thrilled to share my delightful experience.First and foremost, the lightweight aspect of this quilt comforter is an absolute game-changer. Unlike traditional bulky comforters, this one is incredibly lightweight, making it easy to maneuver and adjust according to my comfort needs. It feels like a gentle cloud enveloping me, providing just the right amount of warmth and coziness without feeling suffocating or heavy.The materials used in crafting this quilt comforter are of exceptional quality. The outer fabric is soft and smooth to the touch, adding a luxurious feel to my bedding. The stitching is impeccable, ensuring that the quilt remains intact and free from any loose threads. The overall craftsmanship speaks volumes about the attention to detail that went into its production.One of the things I appreciate most about this comforter is its versatility. It works wonders in both warm and cold weather conditions. During warmer nights, it regulates my body temperature effortlessly, preventing me from overheating. On colder nights, it provides the perfect amount of warmth to keep me cozy and snug without feeling weighed down.Cleaning this quilt comforter is a breeze. I appreciate that it is machine washable and retains its shape and softness even after multiple washes. The colors stay vibrant, and there is no noticeable shrinkage. It's a relief to have a bedding item that is not only comfortable but also easy to maintain.Another notable aspect is the size of the quilt comforter. It perfectly fits my bed, draping elegantly without any overhang or being too short. This attention to size ensures that it complements the overall aesthetics of my bedroom, adding a touch of elegance to the décor.Lastly, the value for money offered by this quilt comforter is outstanding. Considering its superior quality, durability, and the comfort it provides, I feel like I made an excellent investment. It's a testament to the fact that you don't have to compromise on quality or comfort when purchasing a lightweight bedding option.In conclusion, I cannot recommend this lightweight quilt comforter enough. Its lightweight design, premium materials, versatility, easy maintenance, perfect sizing, and overall value for money make it a must-have for anyone seeking a dreamy sleep experience. Say goodbye to restless nights and welcome the ultimate comfort into your life with this remarkable quilt comforter. Trust me; you won't regret it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far I love it.
reviews.reviewText: This blanket is super soft, lightweight and so so cute. I love the tiny tan criss cross quilting stitch. It looks and feels so expensive, but was so affordable. The size is perfect as well. It's large enough to drape over the sides and end of the bed so you can tuck it in if you want to. I read some reviews that said it pilled after washing, so I'm planning to wash it by itself on a delicate cycle and hope that I have good results. With so many positive reviews, I am optimistic that it will perform beautifully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, great color and quality
reviews.reviewText: This is the 2nd one I bought. I loved the queen grey one so much I ordered the burnt orange twin size. So soft, color is perfect and I love the cross stitch. I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and good for the price
reviews.reviewText: The comforter is lightweight while still providing warmth for my elderly mother. It is a good buy for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty! But thin.
reviews.reviewText: I live in north Florida luckily, but it does get cool here. This will not keep you warm at all. But looks great!

Muy linda! Esperaba que fuera más pachoncita pero aún así me encantó! Es suave, ligera, se adapta bien al clima, es frasca en clima neutro y calientita cuando have frío. Los cojines grandes los tenía de otro juego de cama, no son parte del conjunto. Si lo recomiendo!
Super tela, me encantó. Lo único que el color cambia un poco pero de todo lo de más súper bonito.
Una colcha sencilla y no esta mal la calidad.Es delgada y sin ser acolchada.
good value for my money, bedding just as described and a good purchase
Es suave, muy bonita, muy agradable a la vista y ligera. Perfecta! No me arrepiento de haberla comprado.
